content: I would have been more than happy to engage in a one-on-one dialog with the author of this patently false article, proving the Emoluments Clause excludes the President and Vice-President, but she doesn’t possess the moral character or any sense of objectivity to make that happen, so I’ll go on believing she is intent on falsely accusing the President of things he is not guilty of, and is just one in a long, long line of willful mindless shills that stands on the wrong side of the truth and is content to do so.
